languages.text: {n}Вокс издает шорох, похожий на смешок.{/n} "Благодатна и желанна для Эксплоратора миссия рекогносцировки. Счастьем служением переполняется инфодуша того, кто разведывает, анализирует, картографирует". {n}Паскаль опускает взгляд.{/n} "Для меня было бы честью высадиться с вами".

{n}The vox makes a rustling noise that sounds like a chuckle.{/n} "A mission of reconnaissance is a blessed and desirable one for an Explorator. The data-soul of the one who explores, analyses, and charts overflows with the joy of servitude." {n}Pasqal lowers his eyes.{/n} "I would be honoured to disembark with you."
languages.original_text: {n}Вокс издает шорох, похожий на смешок.{/n} "Благодатна и желанна для Эксплоратора миссия рекогносцировки. Счастьем служением переполняется инфодуша того, кто разведывает, анализирует, картографирует". {n}Паскаль опускает взгляд.{/n} "Для меня было бы честью высадиться с вами".

traits.locale_text: {n}The vox makes a rustling noise that sounds like a chuckle.{/n} "The Explorator's mission of reconnaissance is blessed and desirable. The data-soul of the one who explores, analyses, and charts overflows with the happiness of servitude." {n}Pasqual lowers his eyes.{/n} "I would be honoured to disembark with you."

The data-soul of the one who explores, analyses, and charts overflows with the happiness of servitude." {n}Pasqal lowers his eyes.{/n} "I would be honoured to disembark with you."

The data-soul of the one who explores, analyses, and charts overflows with the happiness of servitude." {n}Pasqal lowers his eyes.{/n} "I would be honoured to disembark with you."

{n}The vox makes a rustling noise that sounds like a chuckle.{/n} "A mission of reconnaissance is a blessed and desirable one for an Explorator. The data-soul of the one who explores, analyses, and charts overflows with the joy of servitude." {n}Pasqal lowers his eyes.{/n} "I would be honoured to disembark with you."

languages.text: {n}音阵装置发出了沙沙的声音，听起来像是咯咯笑。{/n}“对开拓者而言，侦查任务是令人向往的美妙任务。探索、分析、绘制图表，这会让数据机魂中洋溢着服侍的快乐。”{n}帕斯卡垂下了目光。{/n}“我很荣幸能与你一起下船。”
languages.original_text: {n}The vox makes a rustling noise that sounds like a chuckle.{/n} "A mission of reconnaissance is a blessed and desirable one for an Explorator. The data-soul of the one who explores, analyses, and charts overflows with the joy of servitude." {n}Pasqal lowers his eyes.{/n} "I would be honoured to disembark with you."

traits.locale_text: {n}音阵装置发出了沙沙的声音，听起来像是咯咯笑。{/n}“对开拓者而言，侦查任务是令人向往的美妙任务。探索、分析、绘制图表，这会让数据机魂中洋溢着服侍的快乐。”{n}帕斯卡垂下了目光。{/n}“我很荣幸能与你一起下船。”

languages.text: {n}El voco produce un sonido crujiente que parece una risa.{/n} «Una misión de reconocimiento es algo bendito y deseado por todo explorador. Los datos de un alma cargada de exploraciones, análisis y gráficas colman a un sirviente de felicidad». {n}Pasqal baja la mirada.{/n} «Sería un honor desembarcar a su lado».
languages.original_text: {n}The vox makes a rustling noise that sounds like a chuckle.{/n} "A mission of reconnaissance is a blessed and desirable one for an Explorator. The data-soul of the one who explores, analyses, and charts overflows with the joy of servitude." {n}Pasqal lowers his eyes.{/n} "I would be honoured to disembark with you."

traits.locale_text: {n}El voco produce un sonido crujiente que parece una risa.{/n} «Una misión de reconocimiento es algo bendito y deseado por todo explorador. Los datos de un alma cargada de exploraciones, análisis y gráficas colman a un sirviente de felicidad». {n}Pasqal baja la mirada.{/n} «Sería un honor desembarcar a su lado».

languages.text: {n}ヴォクスから、笑い声のような雑音がしてくる。{/n}「偵察任務は探検家にとって恵まれたものであり、望ましいものでもある。探求する者、分析する者、図を描く者のデータの魂は、隷属の幸福感で満ちています」{n}パスカルは目を伏せる。{/n}「一緒に下船できるとは光栄です」
languages.original_text: {n}The vox makes a rustling noise that sounds like a chuckle.{/n} "A mission of reconnaissance is a blessed and desirable one for an Explorator. The data-soul of the one who explores, analyses, and charts overflows with the joy of servitude." {n}Pasqal lowers his eyes.{/n} "I would be honoured to disembark with you."

traits.locale_text: {n}ヴォクスから、笑い声のような雑音がしてくる。{/n}「偵察任務は探検家にとって恵まれたものであり、望ましいものでもある。探求する者、分析する者、図を描く者のデータの魂は、隷属の幸福感で満ちています」{n}パスカルは目を伏せる。{/n}「一緒に下船できるとは光栄です」

languages.text: {n}Das Vox stößt ein raschelndes Geräusch aus, das wie ein Lachen klingt.{/n} "Eine Mission der Aufklärung ist für einen Explorator eine gesegnete und erstrebenswerte Mission. Die Datenseelen aller, die erkunden, analysieren und kartografieren, sind voller Freude, dienen zu können." {n}Pasqal senkt den Blick.{/n} "Es wäre mir eine Ehre, mit Euch auszusteigen."
languages.original_text: {n}The vox makes a rustling noise that sounds like a chuckle.{/n} "A mission of reconnaissance is a blessed and desirable one for an Explorator. The data-soul of the one who explores, analyses, and charts overflows with the joy of servitude." {n}Pasqal lowers his eyes.{/n} "I would be honoured to disembark with you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Das Vox stößt ein raschelndes Geräusch aus, das wie ein Lachen klingt.{/n} "Eine Mission der Aufklärung ist für einen Explorator eine gesegnete und erstrebenswerte Mission. Die Datenseelen aller, die erkunden, analysieren und kartografieren, sind voller Glück, dienen zu können." {n}Pasqal senkt den Blick.{/n} "Es wäre mir eine Ehre, mit Euch auszusteigen."

languages.text: {n}Le vox émet un grésillement semblable à un petit rire.{/n} « Pour un Explorator, toute mission de reconnaissance est une aubaine et une bénédiction. L'âme cybernétique du prospecteur qui explore, analyse et cartographie la galaxie est pénétrée de la joie née de la servitude. Je serais honoré de débarquer à vos côtés, » {n}ajoute-t-il en baissant les yeux.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The vox makes a rustling noise that sounds like a chuckle.{/n} "A mission of reconnaissance is a blessed and desirable one for an Explorator. The data-soul of the one who explores, analyses, and charts overflows with the joy of servitude." {n}Pasqal lowers his eyes.{/n} "I would be honoured to disembark with you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le vox émet un grésillement semblable à un petit rire.{/n} « Pour un Explorator, toute mission de reconnaissance est une aubaine et une bénédiction. L'âme cybernétique du prospecteur qui explore, analyse et cartographie la galaxie est pénétrée de la joie née de la servitude. Je serais honoré de débarquer à vos côtés, » {n}ajoute-t-il en baissant les yeux.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vokstan gülüşü andıran, hışırtılı bir ses çıkıyor.{/n} "Keşif ve arama görevi, Keşiftörler için kutsanmış ve arzu duyulan bir görevdir. Keşif, analiz ve haritalandırma yapan birinin veri ruhu, sunduğu hizmetler sayesinde mutlulukla dolup taşar." {n}Pasqal gözlerini indiriyor.{/n} "Göreve birlikte çıkmak, benim için bir onur olur."
languages.original_text: {n}The vox makes a rustling noise that sounds like a chuckle.{/n} "A mission of reconnaissance is a blessed and desirable one for an Explorator. The data-soul of the one who explores, analyses, and charts overflows with the joy of servitude." {n}Pasqal lowers his eyes.{/n} "I would be honoured to disembark with you."
